mapper.select: SELECT a.* , b.product_cate_type , b.product_cate_large , b.product_cate_medium , b.product_cate_small FROM product_tb a INNER JOIN product_cate_tb b ON (a.product_cate_no = b.product_cate_no AND a.product_no= #{productNo})
SELECT c.product_img_no , c.product_img_file_name , c.product_img_type FROM product_tb a INNER JOIN product_img_tb c ON (a.product_no = c.product_no AND a.product_no = #{productNo})
SELECT a.*, b.store_name FROM product_comment_tb WHERE product_no = ${productNo} INNER JOIN user_tb b ON a.product_comment_writer = b.user_no ORDER BY product_comment_reg_dt
